sources.title: 1934 Die Vertauschte Braut ( Anny Ondra, Adolf Wohlbrück, Fritz Odemar, Otto Wernicke, Josef Eichhheim)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1934. Die vertauschte Braut. u.a mit Anny Ondra,Adolf Wohlbrück und Josef Eichheim

metadata.Plot: Capricious Lady Virginia has an unexpected double in a girl who works at a fair and wishes for a beauty salon. When the first one's eccentricities lead to her arrest, the second is paid for going to prison. There she meets Charles, Virginia's suitor. When out of jail she will have to fight not only for him but for going through with the leading role in a skating show.
metadata.Writer: Henry Koster, Peter Ort, Hans H. Zerlett
metadata.Actors: Anny Ondra, Anton Walbrook, Fritz Odemar
